revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=RAX120 |revision=(Leopard)
Nighthawk AX12 |series=AX6000 |asin=B07P3FGKYD |price=500 |est_release_date=11/07/2018 |fcc_date=09/04/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY317300397 |pcb_id=29765589 |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=3.16 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8074;Q, IPQ8074, 002, JE816H5H; |cpu1_cspeed=2.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W29N04GZBIBA |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16EP-EK |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J9003 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=QCN5054;Q, QCN5054, 007, FE743RQR; |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=QCN5054;Q, QCN5054, 007, FE743RQR; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac+ax |wi1_txchains=8 |wi1_rxchains=8 |wi1_sstreams=8 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=QCN5024;Q, QCN5024, 007, FE743FK4; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn+ax |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Aquantia |eth_chip2_model=AQR111 |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075;Q, QCA8075, 0VV, PK716JRN, K071601; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=5 |wan_speed=5GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Power Management IC;Qualcomm;PMP8074;Q, PMP8074, 000-01, PE745VRC;1; |flags=Wi-Fi 6, WPA3, VHT80+80, HE80+80, LACP, Link Aggregation, fan, DFS (master), DFS (slave), |stock_os=Linux;4.4.60;OpenWrt; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ax |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• '''1148''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ax 802.11ax] (40MHz chan.) :• '''4804''' Mbps - 8SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ax 802.11ax] (80MHz chan.) = '''''AX6000'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk AX12 12-Stream AX6000 WiFi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/RAX120.aspx}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=RAX120}} Netgear Nighthawk AX12 12-Stream AX6000 WiFi Router (RAX120-100EUS) :WAN: 1x 1GbE, LAN: 4x 1GbE + 1x 5GbE ports (1G/2.5G/5G [https://www.snbforums.com/attachments/6292280cv11d-jpg.14824/ Multi-Gig]) {{SCollapse|Specifications (FCC Doc, Aquantia LAN chip, DFS certification) • >> | *This device went by the code name '''Leopard''' during development and in FCC documents. :It is likely to be released as the '''Netgear RAX120 (Nighthawk AX12)'''. '''FCC''' documents appear to show that this device is 8x8 for channel bandwidths up to 80MHz
but it drops down to 4x4:4 operation when using VHT80+80 or HE80+80 channel bandwidths. *The '''[[Aquantia]]''' LAN chip's ID is not clear. It is AQR11x but the third digit is not clear. Aquantia does not list any AQR11x parts on their website but an AQR112 has been spotted in
the ''[[Everest Networks AP1004WRi]]'' and internet searches suggest that an AQR111 could exist. *'''DFS''' certification was added with a Class II Product Change request on 3/15/2019. :The software/firmware version used in the tests was V1.0.0.65-DFS-20181121. :The latest firmware available on the Netgear website is [https://kb.netgear.com/000060382/RAX120-Firmware-Version-1-0-0-64 1.0.0.64] as of 3/15/2019. }} *Web GUI: http://www.routerlogin.net {{WiFiCert|WFA79402|11/20/2018}} ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/netgear-leapord-nighthawk-x16-ax11000-wireless-router.48724/ ''Netgear Leopard (Nighthawk X16?) AX11000 Router'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/netgear-nighthawk-ax12-router-outed-by-qatar-isp.49386/ ''Netgear Nighthawk AX12 Router Outed by Qatar ISP'' on '''SNB''' forums] ===News=== *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/13325/netgear-announces-nighthawk-rax80-rax120 ''Netgear Announces Nighthawk RAX80 and RAX120'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[https://www.gulf-times.com/story/609458/Ooredoo-to-launch-advanced-fibre-technology-in-Lus ''Ooredoo to launch advanced fibre technology in Lusail'' on '''Gulf Times'''] *[https://www.forbes.com/sites/tiriasresearch/2018/10/20/netgear-boosts-wi-fi-with-new-nighthawk-ax12-router ''Netgear Boosts Wi-Fi with new Nighthawk AX12 Router'' on '''Forbes'''] *[https://24wireless.info/list-of-11ax-routers ''List of 802.11ax Routers'' on '''24wireless.info'''] ([https://www.netgear.com/about/press-releases/2019/NETGEAR-ANNOUNCES-ORBI-MESH-WI-FI-SYSTEM.aspx Orbi Mesh]) *https://fccid.io/PY317300397 ===See also=== :[[List of Netgear Nighthawk Products]] • [[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] *[[Netgear RAX40 (Nighthawk AX4)]] - AX3000 • ''Nighthawk'' (RAX40) *[[Netgear RAX80 (Nighthawk AX8)]] - AX6000 • ''Jaguar'' AX8 (RAX80) *[[Netgear RAX120 (Nighthawk AX12)]] - AX6000 • ''Leopard'' (RAX120) *[[Netgear RAX200 (Nighthawk Tri-Band AX12)]] - AX11000 (RAX200) ==Images== File:Backplate of PCB.jpg|Backplate of PCB File:Heatsink and Fan.jpg|Heatsink and fan File:PCB with removed Heatsink.jpg|PCB with removed heatsink File:Debug Header.jpg|Debug header File:PY317300397_Aquantia_LAN.jpg|Aquantia LAN chip File:Delta EFB0505LA Fan.jpg|Delta EFB0505LA fan [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
